argument.p: The Flattery and InÅ¿inuations by Town-Shifts, Sharpers, Sharks, &c. to work upon the Humours, PaÅ¿Å¿ions of the Mind, Inclinations, &c. of the Younger, to bring about their pernicious DeÅ¿igns; with Å¿ome AlluÅ¿ions, and apt Stories, by way of Caution.

div.p: IT cannot be denied, but Society is coveted and deÅ¿ired by all; nothing in the Creation can be truly Å¿aid to be averÅ¿e to it.
